org.Barclaycard.com.Rest_WebServices

Class MyResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.Barclaycard.com.Rest_WebServices.MyResource

  • @Path(value="user")
public class MyResource
extends Object
    Two methods. formSubmit() method will be called while submitting the form by POST method. validate() will be called by GET method.
    Since:
    2016-10-01
    Version:
    0.1-snapshot
    Author:
    soumya manna

      javax.ws.rs.core.Response formSubmit(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, String username, String password)
      collecting form params through @formParam attribute choosing 130 bits from a cryptographically secure random bit generator, and encoding them in base-32.

    • Method Detail

      • formSubmit

        @POST
 @Path(value="/formSubmit")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response formSubmit(@Context
                                                                                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                @FormParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                String username,
                                                                                                                @FormParam(value="password")
                                                                                                                String password)
        collecting form params through @formParam attribute choosing 130 bits from a cryptographically secure random bit generator, and encoding them in base-32. get session from request object. if it can't find it will create a new one
        Parameters:
        request - this is HttpServletRequest type
        string - this is username from formParam
        String - this password from formParam
        Returns:
        Response this returns the randon generated token

      • authenticate

        @GET
 @Path(value="/validate")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response authenticate(@QueryParam(value="token")
                                                                                                               String receivedToken,
                                                                                                               @Context
                                                                                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                                        throws Exception
        Parameters:
        request - this is HttpServletRequest type
        string - this is token from queryParam
        Returns:
        Response this returns success or failure according to match
        Throws:
        Exception
